name: DATA VACUUM
description:
Click to guide the dVac (Data Vacuum) around the DIGITAL WEB to sweep up as much PERSONAL DATA as you can. Ignore the cries, embrace the high, and don't fall into THE VOID. 

VACUUM UP PERSONAL DATA!  ( GLOWING V.I.P. DATA GIVES YOU 4X THE POINTS!)

AVOID  THE VOID!

FILL VACUUM WITH ENOUGH DATA FOR HIGHEST SCORE!

Submit your highest sweeps to the LEADERBOARD for competitive satisfaction.

BE AN OVERACHIEVER!

A tiny prototype made in 2hrs 56 mins for TriJam #208 with the theme "Fill The Vacuum"

KNOWN ISSUES/BUGS:

  • Certain SFX/Music don't load on mobile
  • Sometimes you explode 2x after you fall into the void. It's a mystery.

CREDITS:

  • Gameplay Music : mutaknto 
  • Title Screen Music: isaiah658
  • Art : me doing my best  with Piskel
  • SFX : me doing my best with jfxr
  • Other SFX : random assortment of Public Domain works from opengameart.org

(feedback and comments are always appreciated!)
